ambassadors.name: Maci Schoonover
ambassadors.bio: Hi — I’m Maci ("mace"). Retired D1 athlete with a passion for whole-food nutrition. I lead a community of women focused on sustainable fitness through coaching, macro-based meal plans, and weekly training. There’s a place for everyone—let’s win together.

ambassadors.name: David
ambassadors.role: Owner, Metroflex Mansfield • Head Coach & Nutrition Guide
ambassadors.bio: Elite Meals & Catering has been partnered with David for OVER 5 YEARS! From personal training at Metroflex Mansfield to providing nutritional expertise, David caters to all levels, from beginners to pros. Whether you’re aiming for fitness goals or seeking guidance for a healthier lifestyle, David is your go-to guy! Thank you, David, for your invaluable contributions. He has also GENEROUSLY offered free consultations at his gym

ambassadors.name: Jeremie
ambassadors.bio: With 13 years of coaching, Jeremie brings deep experience and energy. Outside the gym he’s with family, rides motorcycles, and enjoys movies and anime. Excited to fuel up with Elite Meals & Catering.

ambassadors.name: Marisol
ambassadors.bio: A full-time working wife and proud mom of two, Marisol keeps fitness a priority—between lifting, CrossFit, and soccer schedules. Balanced, driven, and always moving.

ambassadors.name: Lacy Beckler
ambassadors.bio: Former track & field athlete turned CrossFit competitor since 2013. CF-L1, project manager, DIY lover, and pup wrangler. Passionate about faith, family, and helping others thrive.

ambassadors.name: Macaela
ambassadors.bio: Powerlifting background and training for her first figure show. Real estate agent and master’s student balancing big goals—with her German Shepherd, Veena, always nearby.

ambassadors.name: More Coming Soon
ambassadors.bio: More inspiring Elite Meals & Catering Ambassadors will be joining the team soon—stay tuned.
